dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3011866O] FW: violation of copyright
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Friday, February 09, 2007 7:02 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3011866O] FW: violation of copyright ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. FW: violation of copyright Added by system at Friday, Feb 9 2007 12:30 pm X-MailFrom: gingercbseacoast@ec.rr.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Fri Feb 9 12:30:11 2007 Received: (qmail 549 invoked by alias); 9 Feb 2007 18:30:11 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 546 invoked from network); 9 Feb 2007 18:30:11 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 9 Feb 2007 18:30:11 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 9 Feb 2007 12:30:10 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Fri, 09 Feb 2007 12:30:10 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from gingercbseacoast@ec.rr.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HFaVe-0006Tg-Cs for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 09 Feb 2007 12:30:10 -0600 Received: from ms-smtp-05.southeast.rr.com ([24.25.9.104]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from gingercbseacoast@ec.rr.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HFaVY-000084-0i for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 09 Feb 2007 12:30:04 -0600 Received: from OWNER84J1T8A8N (cpe-065-184-180-246.ec.res.rr.com [65.184.180.246]) by ms-smtp-05.southeast.rr.com (8.13.6/8.13.6) with ESMTP id l19IU0ql027563 for ; Fri, 9 Feb 2007 13:30:01 -0500 (EST) From: "Ginger Sala" To: Subject: FW: violation of copyright Date: Fri, 9 Feb 2007 13:28:28 -0500 Message-ID: <000901c74c78$18581240$f6b4b841@OWNER84J1T8A8N> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_000A_01C74C4E.2F820A40" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 Thread-Index: AcdAv+6+5vCbI0mSTc2gy4ba1wozCwLt8gfg X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 X-Virus-Scanned: Symantec AntiVirus Scan Engine Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of ec.rr.com designates 24.25.9.104 as permitted sender) client-ip=24.25.9.104; envelope-from=gingercbseacoast@ec.rr.com; helo=ms-smtp-05.southeast.rr.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 09 Feb 2007 18:30:10.0973 (UTC) FILETIME=[55081CD0:01C74C78] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) _____ From: Ginger Sala [mailto:gingercbseacoast@ec.rr.com] Sent: Thursday, January 25, 2007 3:33 PM To: 'abuse@ev1services.net' Subject: violation of copyright Coldwell Banker Ginger & Roger Sala Broker/REALTORR/ASP 5710 Oleander Drive Wilmington, NC 28403 Ginger: 910-431-7075 Roger: 910-431-2564 www.theSalaTeam.com One of the people using your hosting services is stealing my copyrighted content and Posting it on www.hanoverliving.com Without my permission. They have no contact information on their site. Comments have been left re: this violation and they were told to remove these blogs but instead the comments are removed. And they continue to add my blogs to their site. This site has nothing to do with my business, and I have no idea why someone would even want to steal my blogs or post them here. I have no editing or removal capabilities. I request that they deny them service. My original posts and photographs are posted. I will file legal action against the Planet if they do not cease and desist from hosting a company that violates your copyrights. This site has nothing to do with my business, and I have no idea why someone would even want to steal my blogs or post them here. Please advise and correct, Thank you, Ginger Sala Custom E-mail Stationery MIME element (text/html)
 
 
 

From: Ginger Sala [mailto:gingercbseacoast@ec.rr.com]
Sent: Thursday, January 25, 2007 3:33 PM
To: 'abuse@ev1services.net'
Subject: violation of copyright

Ginger & Roger Sala
Broker/REALTOR®/ASP
5710 Oleander Drive
Wilmington, NC 28403
Ginger: 910-431-7075
Roger: 910-431-2564
www.theSalaTeam.com

One of the people using your hosting services is stealing my copyrighted content and Posting it on www.hanoverliving.com

  Without my permission.

 They have no contact information on their site.

Comments have been left re: this violation and they were told to remove these blogs but instead the comments are removed. 

And they continue to add my blogs to their site.

 This site has nothing to do with my business, and I have no idea why someone would even want to steal my blogs or post them here. I have no editing or removal capabilities.

 I request that they deny them service. My original posts and photographs are posted.   

 I will file legal action against the Planet if they do not cease and desist from hosting a company that violates your copyrights.

This site has nothing to do with my business, and I have no idea why someone would even want to steal my blogs or post them here.

Please advise and correct,

Thank you,

Ginger Sala

 

Custom E-mail Stationery

 

 
MIME element (text/plain)
